name: Bristol Myers Squibb Company
description: Bristol Myers Squibb Company (BMS) is a global biopharmaceutical company committed to discovering, developing, and delivering innovative medicines that help patients prevail over serious diseases. Founded in 1887 and headquartered in New York City, BMS has a rich history in the pharmaceutical industry and has made significant contributions to the treatment of various conditions, including cancer, cardiovascular diseases, immunologic disorders, and infectious diseases. The company is particularly recognized for its groundbreaking work in oncology, with leading therapies such as Opdivo and Yervoy, which have transformed treatment protocols and improved survival rates for patients with melanoma and other cancers. Bristol Myers Squibb is also focused on advancing therapies in hematology, cardiovascular disease, and immunology, ensuring a broad pipeline of potential treatments. With a strong commitment to research and development, BMS invests heavily in innovative science and technology to address unmet medical needs and to enhance the quality of life for patients around the world. The company’s mission is to discover, develop, and deliver innovative medicines that help patients prevail over serious diseases, aiming to provide hope and solutions for patients and their families.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
